name: Transport It!
description:
The stars are the limit - start your business today!

--
Note: This is an early version of the game. We would love to hear your feedback about it. Would you like this project to go forward? More trucks? Add trains, planes and much, much more...? Developed by a small international indie team of game developers, we care about your feedback! Let us know your thoughts, and the next update might be one of your ideas.
--

Become an idle transport tycoon!
Grow your transport empire in this fun time killer game with elements of color-match, clicker/tapper, and classic idle gameplay. Who knows, maybe you become a real transport magnate? Hurdling obstacles, generate cash.

Gameplay:
You are the leader of a haulage firm. Sending cargo around the world on trucks, you start to make more money while hurdling obstacles along the way.

As a smart transport logistics manager, you need to master the most important locomotion vehicles to run a world-class transport business. You are starting a trucking company today, managing trains tomorrow, ever-growing your company into a big business.
With new and unique game mechanics, no forced advertisement, and fair balancing.

Features:

- Match the right container color to the right truck to get direct cash.
- Purchase more vehicles to deliver more goods.
- Upgrade your trucks to run faster.
- Buy more trailers to have your trucks load more products and become a magnate.
- Buy a crane to put your transport company into idle game mode.
- Expand your company until you can buy a train station, become a seaport-, airport tycoon and finally, own your very own space station!


Subscription:

• Title: Investor Subscription

• Length of subscription: 1 week (length of the subscription)

• Price of subscription: $1.99 / Week

• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase

• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal

• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase

• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
